2.<if_woman>「あっ 姉ちゃん！| こんな所に いたんだ？<else>「あ: <if_woman>Oh, sis! You're in a place like this?<else>Oh, brother! You're in a place like this?<endif>

3.「よかった。| ちっちゃいアバさまの 言ったとおりだ。| ……思いって ちゃんと: Yo. Just like little Ava said. ... I guess|feelings are meant to be heard!

4.<if_woman>「おいら 姉ちゃんに これを届けにきたんだよ。<else>「: <if_woman>I came to deliver this to my sister.<else>I came to deliver this to my brother.<endif>

6.<if_woman>「せっかく 作ってあげたのに| 忘れていったでしょ？| ホン: <if_woman>I went to the trouble of making it for you,|but you forgot it, didn't you? You're really|a naughty girl.<else>I went to the trouble of making it for you,|but you forgot it, didn't you? You're really|a naughty boy.<endif>

7.「……今まで ありがとう。| 迷惑ばっかりかけて ごめんね。: ... Until now, yes. I'm sorry for all the|trouble I've caused you.

8.<if_woman>「大好きだよ…… 姉ちゃん！！<else>「大好きだよ……: <if_woman>I love you... Sis!<else>I love you... Brother!<endif>

12.「あっ お前！| こんな所に いやがったのか？: Oh, you! You didn't want me here?

13.「あっ！| あんた こんな所に いたのね？: Ah! You're in the middle of nowhere, aren't|you?

14.<if_woman>「あっ お姉ちゃん！| こんな所に いたんだ～？<else>: <if_woman>Oh, sis! You're in a place like this~?<else>Oh, big brother! You were here~?<endif>

15.「よかった。| ちっちゃいアバさまの 言ったとおりだぜ。| ……思いって ちゃん: Yo. Just like little Ava said. ... I guess|feelings really do reach people!

16.「よかったわ。| ちっちゃいアバさまの 言ったとおりね。| ……思いって ちゃん: Good. Just like little Ava said. ... I know|you're thinking of me!

17.「よかった。| ちっちゃいアバさまの 言ったとおりだよ。| ……思いって ちゃん: Yo. Just like little Ava said. ... I guess|feelings really do reach people!

18.「オレは お前に これを届けにきたんだ。: I came to bring you this.

19.「あたし あんたに これを届けにきたのよ。: I came to bring you this.

20.<if_woman>「私 お姉ちゃんに これを届けにきたんだよ。<else>「私: <if_woman>I came to give this to you.<else>I came to give this to your brother.<endif>

21.「オレが せっかく 作ってやったのに| 忘れていっただろ？| ホント お前は お: I made it for you, and you forgot it. You're|really a naughty boy.

22.「せっかく 作ってあげたのに| 忘れていったでしょ？| あんたって ホント おっ: I went to the trouble of making it for you,|but you forgot it, didn't you? You're such a|naughty boy!

23.<if_woman>「せっかく 作ってあげたのに| 忘れていったでしょ？ お姉ち: <if_woman>I went to the trouble of making it for you,|but you forgot it, didn't you? You're such a|naughty girl.<else>I went to the trouble of making it for you,|but you forgot it, didn't you? You're such a|naughty boy, big brother.<endif>

24.「……今まで ありがとうな。| 迷惑ばっかりかけて 悪かったよ。: ... Thanks for everything. I'm sorry for all|the trouble I've caused you.

25.「……今まで ありがと。| いっぱい迷惑かけて 悪かったわね。: ... Until now... I'm sorry for all the|trouble I've caused you.

26.「……今まで ありがとう。| いっぱい迷惑かけちゃって ごめんね。: ... Until now, yes. I'm sorry for all the|trouble I've caused you.

29.<if_woman>「大好きだよ…… お姉ちゃん！！<else>「大好きだよ……: <if_woman>I love you... Sis!<else>I love you... Big brother!<endif>

32.「滅びの運命は 時を刻み始めました……。: The doom of doom has begun to mark the hour.

33.「私はここで 戦う意志を持つ者を待ちましょう。| あなたたちは 五大陸の 王の所: I wait here for those who are willing to|fight. You will go to the kings of the five|continents and tell them what must be done.
